T02D2571:31a-0: @31a * // 'jam dpal dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//
T02D2571:31a-3: skye ba mi lus thob pa rnams //
T02D2571:31a-4: mi lus thob pa shin tu dka' //
T02D2571:31a-5: de bas dam chos rnyed par dka' //
T02D2571:31a-6: des na sgrub la brtson par bya //
T02D2571:31a-8: da lta nyid du bsnun te bya //
T02D2571:31a-9: yid dga' ba yi gnas dag tu //
T02D2571:31a-10: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
T02D2571:31b-0: @31b skad cig tsam gyis lha ru dmigs //
T02D2571:31b-2: bla ma dang ni yi dam lha //
T02D2571:31b-3: mdun du bsam par byas pa las //
T02D2571:31b-4: dngos po kun gyis phyag byas pas //
T02D2571:31b-5: phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchong //
T02D2571:31b-6: sdig pa bshags dang rjes yi rang //
T02D2571:31b-7: skyabs su 'gro dang sems bskyed bya //
T02D2571:31b-8: dge ba bsngo dang gshegs su gsol //
T02D2571:31b-9: de dag yid kyis bya bar bshad //
T02D2571:31b-10: de nas tshad med bzhi bsgoms la //
T02D2571:31b-11: stong pa nyid la goms par bya //
T02D2571:31b-12: aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02D2571:31b-13: stong nyid brtan par bya ba'o //
T02D2571:31b-14: de nas mum dang autpal las //
T02D2571:31b-15: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsam //
T02D2571:31b-16: sku mdog gser mdog ldem bag can //
T02D2571:31b-17: rin po che yi dbu rgyan dang //
T02D2571:31b-18: snyan cha gdu bu dpung rgyan dang //
T02D2571:31b-19: 'og pag dang ni zhabs gdub dang //
T02D2571:31b-20: rin chen rnams kyis mdzes par brgyan //
T02D2571:31b-21: sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhin du bzhugs //
T02D2571:31b-22: g-yas na autpala sngon po bsnams //
T02D2571:31b-24: spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol ba la //
T02D2571:31b-25: phyi dang nang gi mchod pa bya //
T02D2571:31b-26: gnyis su med par bdag la bstim //
T02D2571:31b-27: mi phyed pa ru rgyas par bsgom //
T02D2571:31b-28: de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni //
T02D2571:31b-29: rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' bsam //
T02D2571:31b-30: de nas ting 'dzin sems dpa' ste //
T02D2571:31b-31: padma'i gdan la rab bzhugs pa //
T02D2571:31b-32: yi ge drug gis bskor ba ste //
T02D2571:31b-33: aom w'a g'i shva ri mum //
T02D2571:31b-34: dmigs pa gtad la bzlas pa bya //
T02D2571:31b-35: skyo zhing gtong bar 'dod pa na //
T02D2571:31b-36: spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba dang //
T02D2571:31b-37: bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya //
T02D2571:31b-38: rnam pa kun dang dus kun du //
T02D2571:31b-40: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya //
T02D2571:31b-41: dkar nag dmar dang ser dang ljang //
T02D2571:31b-42: gsal ba dag tu dmigs pa las //
T02D2571:31b-43: thugs kar yi ge lnga bkod de //
T02D2571:31b-45: phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod //
T02D2571:31b-46: mtshan gyi bstod pa dag bya'o //
T02D2571:31b-47: yang na mdun du dmigs par bya //
T02D2571:31b-48: bstod pa rang bzhin med par bsam //
T02D2571:31b-49: bstod pa zin nas gshegs su gsol //
T02D2571:31b-50: de nas mtshan med bsgom pa la //
T02D2571:31b-51: tha ma nas bsdu dang por bsdu //
T02D2571:31b-52: bdag bsdu ye shes sems dpa' la //
T02D2571:31b-53: ye shes sems dpa' aa la bsdu //
T02D2571:31b-54: de yang rang bzhin dmigs med de //
T02D2571:32a-0: @32a * // de la brtan pa thob pa ni //
T02D2571:32a-1: chos sku skye med thob ces bya //
T02D2571:32a-2: tshigs bcad bcu drug ldan pa 'di //
T02D2571:32a-3: ye shes zhal mthong gnyis med rtogs //
T02D2571:32a-5: mkhas rnams gus par blang bar bgyi //
T02D2571:32a-6: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
T02D2571:32a-7: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D2571:32a-8: snod bcud sgrib pa byang nas su //
T02D2571:32a-9: bla med byang chub thob par shog / dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs //
T02D2571:32a-10: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D2571:32a-11: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang /
